name: QuizoftheDayskillforAmazonAlexa
0:
”Alexa, open Quiz of the Day.”
”Alexa, play Quiz of the Day.”
”Alexa, ask Quiz of the Day.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quiz of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Quiz of the Day skill for Amazon Alexa poses new fun & addictive trivia questions daily to give your brain some mental exercise!

You can earn bonus questions, collect points & badges, compete against other players on local & state leaderboards, get player statistics, and much more!

We are sure you've played trivia before. But, have you played a quiz game where you get new questions daily and compete with thousands of other players worldwide on Amazon Alexa?

Join thousands of players in a brain teaser that combines Quiz with Voice - Quiz of the day!

Learn, grow and have fun competing with friends and players on Amazon Alexa on interests you’re best at.

Play and earn points and badges that prove you’re the best in the world in your favorite topic.

Play on Amazon Alexa while competing with friends and other players from around the world in a wide variety of topics ranging from general knowledge, science, sports, history, geography, action movies, internet, video games, arts and entertainment, music, literature, world capitals, solar system, food, beverage, and much more, for an exciting game of trivia.

Climb global ranks on state, local & player leaderboard and claim badges for every topic.

Your love is encouraging us to add new categories & content all the time - so keep checking back for new stuff every day!

Just ask Alexa to Play Quiz of the Day.

If you like our skill, please review the same on the skill store. If you have any feedback, please contact us at feedback@quizoftheday.org.

You know what? You can also suggest new questions to be asked by filling a form here: http://bit.ly/quizotd

Thank you!

Disclaimer: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.

You can connect with us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/AskQuizOfTheDay and Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/askquizoftheday

Thank you so much for the Quiz of the Day team!
